message.content:
The systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is depreciation.

Looking at the financial statements provided:

- In the **balance sheet**, the "Accumulated Depreciation" has an End_amount of 45,749.76.
- In the **cash flow statement**, the line item "Depreciation" shows an amount of 45,749.76.
- In the **income statement**, the line item "Depreciation" also shows 45,749.76.

Therefore, the depreciation amount representing the systematic allocation is 45,749.76.

{"solution": {"value": "45749.76"}}
